sentences.en: A COBOL mnemonic name associated with the console typewriter.
sentences.cn: 和控制台打字机有关的一种COBOL助记忆名.

sentences.en: But I console myself with the lustre it's already bringing to our practice.
sentences.cn: 不过,能安慰我的是,我们的事业因之灿然生辉.

sentences.en: By and by, Margaret timidly stole near him, as if waiting to console.
sentences.cn: 隔了一会, 玛格丽特怯生生地挨近到他身边来, 仿佛等着要安慰他.

sentences.en: He would sit before the console board and play the machines like a virtuose.
sentences.cn: 他坐在控制台前,就象一位著名的演奏能手在操纵机器.
我要买一架落地收音机.

sentences.en: I'll console Mr. Edgar by acquainting him with the turn Heathcliff's humour has taken.
sentences.cn: 我要报告埃德加先生,说希刺克厉夫的脾气有什么样的转变,借以安慰他.

sentences.en: Its centerpiece was a communications console on a dais two steps above floor level.
sentences.cn: 它的中心部件是位于地面两级台阶之上的调度台上的通讯控制板.

sentences.en: Nim Goldman had been conferring with somebody at the dispatch console.
sentences.cn: 尼姆?哥尔德曼一直在调度台上与别人商量.

sentences.en: No one could console her when Peter died.
sentences.cn: 彼得去世时没人能够安慰她。

sentences.en: Nothing could console her till the inward storm had had its way.
sentences.cn: 除了听任她的内心风暴发作下去,任怎样都安慰不了她.

sentences.en: Several nurses sat before a console of flickering lights and bleeping monitors.
sentences.cn: 几名护士坐在灯光闪烁、监听器嘟嘟作响的控制台前。

sentences.en: She felt she could console the child better than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己比任何人都能更好地安慰这孩子.

sentences.en: The console is just like a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 控制台就像一台打字机.

sentences.en: The Power Distribution Unit distributes power to the various console and table units.
sentences.cn: 电源配电装置其作用是把电源分配给各个控制箱和转台.

sentences.en: This Christmas sees the launch of a new games console.
sentences.cn: 这个圣诞节会有一款新型游戏机上市。

sentences.en: Was it not the duty in Christian charity to try to console the mourner?
sentences.cn: 基督教的慈悲,不是教人安慰受难者 吗 ?

sentences.en: We tried to console her when her dog died.
sentences.cn: 她的狗死后,我们尽力安慰她.

words.tran_cn: 安慰；慰问；起安慰作用的人或事物

phrases.tran_cn: 游戏控制台；携带型电脑游戏

trans.tran_en: a flat board that contains the controls for a machine, piece of electrical equipment, computer etc
to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
